name: Set up heist
description:
Buckle up for some fast paced platforming, because you will be stealing some precious diamonds. In this game, you have to return the diamond to the exit, but only the blocks you touched on the way to the diamond remain visible after you collected the shiny loot. Your jumping and moving through the level has two purposes: by activating the right blocks you can make your escape possible!

This game took me about 10 hrs to create. Use the arrow keys to move around.

Tools used:

  • Gamemaker studio
  • Bosca ceoil for music: http://boscaceoil.net/
  • sfxr for sounds: http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
  • inkscape for some graphics: https://inkscape.org/
